definition: surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
human flesh search engine/a large-scale collective effort to find details about a person or event (Internet slang)
pinyin: ren2 rou4 sou1 suo3 yin3 qing2

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戲劇性的是，目標驅動的搜索引擎營銷活動的介紹。

sentences.english: Ideally, every key value in the index is unique.
sentences.chinese: 理想情況是，索引中的每個鍵值都是惟一的。

sentences.english: But, you can perform range scans on the remaining columns in the index key.
sentences.chinese: 但是，您可以在索引鍵的其餘列上執行範圍掃面。

sentences.english: Both sets of columns may be indexed, but by different indexes.
sentences.chinese: 這兩組列都可以編制索引，但是使用不同的索引。

sentences.english: Both sets of columns may be indexed, but by different indexes.
sentences.chinese: 這兩組列都可以編制索引，但是使用不同的索引。

sentences.english: Replaces the item at the specified index with a new object.
sentences.chinese: 使用指定項替換指定索引處的項。

sentences.english: You can specify which non-key columns to include in the index and use the arrows again to specify the order.
sentences.chinese: 可以指定索引中包含哪些非鍵列並用箭頭指定次序。

sentences.english: Clean up any beads of mercury by using an index card and plastic dustpan.
sentences.chinese: 用撲索引卡和塑料簸箕清理水銀珠子。

sentences.english: It also lets you search and compare results from two search engines side by side.
sentences.chinese: 它還提供從兩個搜索引擎搜索和並列比較結果。

sentences.english: For search engines, mainly Baidu and GG, respectively, please answer.
sentences.chinese: 針對搜索引擎，主要是百度和GG，請分別解答。

sentences.english: Sites owned by search engine optimizers are not accepted.
sentences.chinese: 通過搜索引擎優化國有土地沒有被接受。

sentences.english: Create full-text indexes on databases that are searched regularly.
sentences.chinese: 在需要定期進行搜索的數據庫上創建全文索引。

sentences.english: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
sentences.chinese: 從目標數組的指定索引處開始複製項。

sentences.english: The overall cost depends on whether there is an index on the join columns.
sentences.chinese: 總成本取決於連接列上是否有索引。

sentences.english: It is the best to classify the patent document into the technology field. That the patent document is not classified is practicable.
sentences.chinese: 而專利公報與專利索引宜入技術領域或乾脆不分類。

sentences.english: It's seems this part of the ancient text was indexical in nature!
sentences.chinese: 看彷彿這個段子的那古代的原文一次有了索引的種類。

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
